directions: Stir garlic, mayonnaise, herbs, lemon zest, and lemon juice in a small bowl to combine; season with salt and pepper.
Mayonnaise can be made 6 hours ahead. Cover and chill.
ingredients: 1/2 cup finely chopped mixed tender herbs (such as basil, chives, parsley, and/or tarragon)
title: Lemon-Herb Mayonnaise
